h2. Create Machine Bucket
{{html:
<hr>
<div class="form-horizontal">
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Name:</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <input ng-model="newMachine.name" type="text" class="input-large" placeholder="Name"/>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" style="display: none">Description:</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <textarea ng-model="newMachine.description" type="text" class="input-large" placeholder="Description" />
        </div>
    </div>
	<hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label">Plan *:</label>
        <div class="controls " >
            {{include:plan_list}}
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Storage:</label>
        <div class="controls " >
            {{include:storage_list}}
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" style="display: none">Region</label>
        <div class="controls ">{{include:region_list}}</div>
    </div>
	<hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Image</label>
        <div class="controls ">{{include:image_list}}</div>
    </div>

    <div class="form-actions">
        <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-click="saveNewMachine()" ng-disabled="!isValid()">Create</button>
    </div>
    <hr>
}}
    {{div: class=msg}}
	*Fair use policy for Unlimited Transfer:*
        * Small machines: <= 4 cores = 1 Mbit/s average usage per month
        * Large machines: >= 5 cores = 5 Mbit/saverage usage per month
    _This fits 99% of our customers. If you need more bandwidth, we have special plans, contact us!_
	{{div}}


{{html: </div>}}
